chapter.text: Al-Hamdu Lillahi Al-Ladhi 'Anzala `Ala `Abdihi Al-Kitaba Wa Lam Yaj`al Llahu `Iwaja
Qayyimaan Liyundhira Ba'saan Shadidaan Min Ladunhu Wa Yubashira Al-Mu'uminina Al-Ladhina Ya`maluna As-Salihati 'Anna Lahum 'Ajraan Hasanaan
Makithina Fihi 'Abadaan
Wa Yundhira Al-Ladhina Qalu Attakhadha Allahu Waladaan
Mma Lahum Bihi Min `Ilmin Wa La Li'aba'ihim Kaburat Kalimatan Takhruju Min 'Afwahihim 'In Yaquluna 'Illa Kadhibaan
Fala`allaka Bakhi`un Nafsaka `Ala 'Atharihim 'In Lam Yu'uminu Bihadha Al-Hadithi 'Asafaan
Inna Ja`alna Ma `Ala Al-'Arđi Zinatan Laha Linabluwahum 'Ayyuhum 'Ahsanu `Amalaan
Wa 'Inna Laja`iluna Ma `Alayha Sa`idaan Juruzaan
Am Hasibta 'Anna 'Ashaba Al-Kahfi Wa Ar-Raqimi Kanu Min 'Ayatina `Ajabaan
Idh 'Awa Al-Fityatu 'Ila Al-Kahfi Faqalu Rabbana 'Atina Min Ladunka Rahmatan Wa Hayyi' Lana Min 'Amrina Rashadaan
Fađarabna `Ala 'Adhanihim Fi Al-Kahfi Sinina `Adadaan
Thumma Ba`athnahum Lina`lama 'Ayyu Al-Hizbayni 'Ahsa Lima Labithu 'Amadaan
Nahnu Naqussu `Alayka Naba'ahum Bil-Haqqi 'Innahum Fityatun 'Amanu Birabbihim Wa Zidnahum Hudaan
Wa Rabatna `Ala Qulubihim 'Idh Qamu Faqalu Rabbuna Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Lan Nad`uwa Min Dunihi 'Ilahaan Laqad Qulna 'Idhaan Shatataan
Ha'ula' Qawmuna Attakhadhu Min Dunihi 'Alihatan Lawla Ya'tuna `Alayhim Bisultanin Bayyinin Faman 'Azlamu Mimmani Aftara `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan
Wa 'Idh A`tazaltumuhum Wa Ma Ya`buduna 'Illa Allaha Fa'wu 'Ila Al-Kahfi Yanshur Lakum Rabbukum Min Rahmatihi Wa Yuhayyi' Lakum Min 'Amrikum Mirfaqaan

Wa Tara Ash-Shamsa 'Idha Tala`at Tazawaru `An Kahfihim Dhata Al-Yamini Wa 'Idha Gharabat Taqriđuhum Dhata Ash-Shimali Wa Hum Fi Fajwatin Minhu Dhalika Min 'Ayati Allahi Man Yahdi Allahu Fahuwa Al-Muhtadi Wa Man Yuđlil Falan Tajida Lahu Waliyaan Murshidaan

Wa Tahsabuhum 'Ayqazaan Wa Hum Ruqudun Wa Nuqallibuhum Dhata Al-Yamini Wa Dhata Ash-Shimali Wa Kalbuhum Basitun Dhira`ayhi Bil-Wasidi Lawi Attala`ta `Alayhim Lawallayta Minhum Firaraan Wa Lamuli'ta Minhum Ru`baan

Wa Kadhalika Ba`athnahum Liyatasa'alu Baynahum Qala Qa'ilun Minhum Kam Labithtum Qalu Labithna Yawmaan 'Aw Ba`đa Yawmin Qalu Rabbukum 'A`lamu Bima Labithtum Fab`athu 'Ahadakum Biwariqikum Hadhihi 'Ila Al-Madinati Falyanzur 'Ayyuha 'Azka Ta`amaan Falya'tikum Birizqin Minhu Wa Liatalattaf Wa La Yush`iranna Bikum 'Ahadaan
Innahum 'In Yazharu `Alaykum Yarjumukum 'Aw Yu`idukum Fi Millatihim Wa Lan Tuflihu 'Idhaan 'Abadaan

Wa Kadhalika 'A`tharna `Alayhim Liya`lamu 'Anna Wa`da Allahi Haqqun Wa 'Anna As-Sa`ata La Rayba Fiha 'Idh Yatanaza`una Baynahum 'Amrahum Faqalu Abnu `Alayhim Bunyanaan Rabbuhum 'A`lamu Bihim Qala Al-Ladhina Ghalabu `Ala 'Amrihim Lanattakhidhanna `Alayhim Masjidaan

Sayaquluna Thalathatun Rabi`uhum Kalbuhum Wa Yaquluna Khamsatun Sadisuhum Kalbuhum Rajmaan Bil-Ghaybi Wa Yaquluna Sab`atun Wa Thaminuhum Kalbuhum Qul Rabbi 'A`lamu Bi`iddatihim Ma Ya`lamuhum 'Illa Qalilun Fala Tumari Fihim 'Illa Mira'an Zahiraan Wa La Tastafti Fihim Minhum 'Ahadaan
Wa La Taqulanna Lishay'in 'Inni Fa`ilun Dhalika Ghadaan
Illa 'An Yasha'a Allahu Wa Adhkur Rabbaka 'Idha Nasita Wa Qul `Asa 'An Yahdiyani Rabbi Li'qraba Min Hadha Rashadaan
Wa Labithu Fi Kahfihim Thalatha Mia'atin Sinina Wa Azdadu Tis`aan
Quli Allahu 'A`lamu Bima Labithu Lahu Ghaybu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi 'Absir Bihi Wa 'Asmi` Ma Lahum Min Dunihi Min Wa Liyin Wa La Yushriku Fi Hukmihi 'Ahadaan
Wa Atlu Ma 'Uhiya 'Ilayka Min Kitabi Rabbika La Mubaddila Likalimatihi Wa Lan Tajida Min Dunihi Multahadaan

Wa Asbir Nafsaka Ma`a Al-Ladhina Yad`una Rabbahum Bil-Ghadaati Wa Al-`Ashiyi Yuriduna Wajhahu Wa La Ta`du `Aynaka `Anhum Turidu Zinata Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa La Tuti` Man 'Aghfalna Qalbahu `An Dhikrina Wa Attaba`a Hawahu Wa Kana 'Amruhu Furutaan

Wa Quli Al-Haqqu Min Rabbikum Faman Sha'a Falyu'umin Wa Man Sha'a Falyakfur 'Inna 'A`tadna Lilzzalimina Naraan 'Ahata Bihim Suradiquha Wa 'In Yastaghithu Yughathu Bima'in Kalmuhli Yashwi Al-Wujuha Bi'sa Ash-Sharabu Wa Sa'at Murtafaqaan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati 'Inna La Nuđi`u 'Ajra Man 'Ahsana `Amalaan

Ula'ika Lahum Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtihimu Al-'Anharu Yuhallawna Fiha Min 'Asawira Min Dhahabin Wa Yalbasuna Thiyabaan Khuđraan Min Sundusin Wa 'Istabraqin Muttaki'ina Fiha `Ala Al-'Ara'iki Ni`ma Ath-Thawabu Wa Hasunat Murtafaqaan
Wa Ađrib Lahum Mathalaan Rajulayni Ja`alna Li'hadihima Jannatayni Min 'A`nabin Wa Hafafnahuma Binakhlin Wa Ja`alna Baynahuma Zar`aan
Kilta Al-Jannatayni 'Atat 'Ukulaha Wa Lam Tazlim Minhu Shay'aan Wa Fajjarna Khilalahuma Naharaan
Wa Kana Lahu Thamarun Faqala Lisahibihi Wa Huwa Yuhawiruhu 'Ana 'Aktharu Minka Malaan Wa 'A`azzu Nafaraan
Wa Dakhala Jannatahu Wa Huwa Zalimun Linafsihi Qala Ma 'Azunnu 'An Tabida Hadhihi 'Abadaan
Wa Ma 'Azunnu As-Sa`ata Qa'imatan Wa La'in Rudidtu 'Ila Rabbi La'ajidanna Khayraan Minha Munqalabaan
Qala Lahu Sahibuhu Wa Huwa Yuhawiruhu 'Akafarta Bial-Ladhi Khalaqaka Min Turabin Thumma Min Nutfatin Thumma Sawwaka Rajulaan
Lakinna Huwa Allahu Rabbi Wa La 'Ushriku Birabbi 'Ahadaan
Wa Lawla 'Idh Dakhalta Jannataka Qulta Ma Sha'a Allahu La Quwata 'Illa Billahi 'In Tarani 'Ana 'Aqalla Minka Malaan Wa Waladaan
Fa`asa Rabbi 'An Yu'utiyani Khayraan Min Jannatika Wa Yursila `Alayha Husbanaan Mina As-Sama'i Fatusbiha Sa`idaan Zalaqaan
Aw Yusbiha Ma'uuha Ghawraan Falan Tastati`a Lahu Talabaan
Wa 'Uhita Bithamarihi Fa'asbaha Yuqallibu Kaffayhi `Ala Ma 'Anfaqa Fiha Wa Hiya Khawiyatun `Ala `Urushiha Wa Yaqulu Ya Laytani Lam 'Ushrik Birabbi 'Ahadaan
Wa Lam Takun Lahu Fi'atun Yansurunahu Min Duni Allahi Wa Ma Kana Muntasiraan
Hunalika Al-Walayatu Lillahi Al-Haqqi Huwa Khayrun Thawabaan Wa Khayrun `Uqbaan
Wa Ađrib Lahum Mathala Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Kama'in 'Anzalnahu Mina As-Sama'i Fakhtalata Bihi Nabatu Al-'Arđi Fa'asbaha Hashimaan Tadhruhu Ar-Riyahu Wa Kana Allahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Muqtadiraan
Al-Malu Wa Al-Banuna Zinatu Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Al-Baqiyatu As-Salihatu Khayrun `Inda Rabbika Thawabaan Wa Khayrun 'Amalaan
Wa Yawma Nusayyiru Al-Jibala Wa Tara Al-'Arđa Barizatan Wa Hasharnahum Falam Nughadir Minhum 'Ahadaan
Wa `Uriđu `Ala Rabbika Saffaan Laqad Ji'tumuna Kama Khalaqnakum 'Awwala Marratin Bal Za`amtum 'Allan Naj`ala Lakum Maw`idaan

Wa Wuđi`a Al-Kitabu Fatara Al-Mujrimina Mushfiqina Mimma Fihi Wa Yaquluna Ya Waylatana Mali Hadha Al-Kitabi La Yughadiru Saghiratan Wa La Kabiratan 'Illa 'Ahsaha Wa Wajadu Ma `Amilu Hađiraan Wa La Yazlimu Rabbuka 'Ahadaan

Wa 'Idh Qulna Lilmala'ikati Asjudu Li'dama Fasajadu 'Illa 'Iblisa Kana Mina Al-Jinni Fafasaqa `An 'Amri Rabbihi 'Afatattakhidhunahu Wa Dhurriyatahu 'Awliya'a Min Duni Wa Hum Lakum `Aduwun Bi'sa Lilzzalimina Badalaan
Ma 'Ash/hadtuhum Khalqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa La Khalqa 'Anfusihim Wa Ma Kuntu Muttakhidha Al-Muđillina `Ađudaan
Wa Yawma Yaqulu Nadu Shuraka'iya Al-Ladhina Za`amtum Fada`awhum Falam Yastajibu Lahum Wa Ja`alna Baynahum Mawbiqaan
Wa Ra'a Al-Mujrimuna An-Nara Fazannu 'Annahum Muwaqi`uha Wa Lam Yajidu `Anha Masrifaan
Wa Laqad Sarrafna Fi Hadha Al-Qur'ani Lilnnasi Min Kulli Mathalin Wa Kana Al-'Insanu 'Akthara Shay'in Jadalaan
Wa Ma Mana`a An-Nasa 'An Yu'uminu 'Idh Ja'ahumu Al-Huda Wa Yastaghfiru Rabbahum 'Illa 'An Ta'tiyahum Sunnatu Al-'Awwalina 'Aw Ya'tiyahumu Al-`Adhabu Qubulaan
Wa Ma Nursilu Al-Mursalina 'Illa Mubashirina Wa Mundhirina Wa Yujadilu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bil-Batili Liyudhiđu Bihi Al-Haqqa Wa Attakhadhu 'Ayati Wa Ma 'Undhiru Huzuan

Wa Man 'Azlamu Mimman Dhukkira Bi'ayati Rabbihi Fa'a`rađa `Anha Wa Nasiya Ma Qaddamat Yadahu 'Inna Ja`alna `Ala Qulubihim 'Akinnatan 'An Yafqahuhu Wa Fi 'Adhanihim Waqraan Wa 'In Tad`uhum 'Ila Al-Huda Falan Yahtadu 'Idhaan 'Abadaan
Wa Rabbuka Al-Ghafuru Dhu Ar-Rahmati Law Yu'uakhidhuhum Bima Kasabu La`ajjala Lahumu Al-`Adhaba Bal Lahum Maw`idun Lan Yajidu Min Dunihi Maw'ilaan
Wa Tilka Al-Qura 'Ahlaknahum Lamma Zalamu Wa Ja`alna Limahlikihim Maw`idaan
Wa 'Idh Qala Musa Lifatahu La 'Abrahu Hatta 'Ablugha Majma`a Al-Bahrayni 'Aw 'Amđiya Huqubaan
Falamma Balagha Majma`a Baynihima Nasiya Hutahuma Fa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri Sarabaan
Falamma Jawaza Qala Lifatahu 'Atina Ghada'ana Laqad Laqina Min Safarina Hadha Nasabaan
Qala 'Ara'ayta 'Idh 'Awayna 'Ila As-Sakhrati Fa'inni Nasitu Al-Huta Wa Ma 'Ansanihu 'Illa Ash-Shaytanu 'An 'Adhkurahu Wa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri `Ajabaan
Qala Dhalika Ma Kunna Nabghi Fartadda `Ala 'Atharihima Qasasaan
Fawajada `Abdaan Min `Ibadina 'Ataynahu Rahmatan Min `Indina Wa `Allamnahu Min Ladunna `Ilmaan
Qala Lahu Musa Hal 'Attabi`uka `Ala 'An Tu`allimani Mimma `Ullimta Rushdaan
Qala 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Wa Kayfa Tasbiru `Ala Ma Lam Tuhit Bihi Khubraan
Qala Satajiduni 'In Sha'a Allahu Sabiraan Wa La 'A`si Laka 'Amraan
Qala Fa'ini Attaba`tani Fala Tas'alni `An Shay'in Hatta 'Uhditha Laka Minhu Dhikraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha Rakiba Fi As-Safinati Kharaqaha Qala 'Akharaqtaha Litughriqa 'Ahlaha Laqad Ji'ta Shay'aan 'Imraan
Qala 'Alam 'Aqul 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Qala La Tu'uakhidhni Bima Nasitu Wa La Turhiqni Min 'Amri `Usraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha Laqiya Ghulamaan Faqatalahu Qala 'Aqatalta Nafsaan Zakiyatan Bighayri Nafsin Laqad Ji'ta Shay'aan Nukraan
Qala 'Alam 'Aqul Laka 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Qala 'In Sa'altuka `An Shay'in Ba`daha Fala Tusahibni Qad Balaghta Min Ladunni `Udhraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha 'Ataya 'Ahla Qaryatin Astat`ama 'Ahlaha Fa'abaw 'An Yuđayyifuhuma Fawajada Fiha Jidaraan Yuridu 'An Yanqađđa Fa'aqamahu Qala Law Shi'ta Lattakhadhta `Alayhi 'Ajraan
Qala Hadha Firaqu Bayni Wa Baynika Sa'unabbi'uka Bita'wili Ma Lam Tastati` `Alayhi Sabraan
Amma As-Safinatu Fakanat Limasakina Ya`maluna Fi Al-Bahri Fa'aradtu 'An 'A`ibaha Wa Kana Wara'ahum Malikun Ya'khudhu Kulla Safinatin Ghasbaan
Wa 'Amma Al-Ghulamu Fakana 'Abawahu Mu'uminayni Fakhashina 'An Yurhiqahuma Tughyanaan Wa Kufraan
Fa'aradna 'An Yubdilahuma Rabbuhuma Khayraan Minhu Zakaatan Wa 'Aqraba Ruhmaan

Wa 'Amma Al-Jidaru Fakana Lighulamayni Yatimayni Fi Al-Madinati Wa Kana Tahtahu Kanzun Lahuma Wa Kana 'Abuhuma Salihaan Fa'arada Rabbuka 'An Yablugha 'Ashuddahuma Wa Yastakhrija Kanzahuma Rahmatan Min Rabbika Wa Ma Fa`altuhu `An 'Amri Dhalika Ta'wilu Ma Lam Tasti` `Alayhi Sabraan
Wa Yas'alunaka `An Dhi Al-Qarnayni Qul Sa'atlu `Alaykum Minhu Dhikraan
Inna Makkanna Lahu Fi Al-'Arđi Wa 'Ataynahu Min Kulli Shay'in Sababaan
Fa'atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Maghriba Ash-Shamsi Wajadaha Taghrubu Fi `Aynin Hami'atin Wa Wajada `Indaha Qawmaan Qulna Ya Dha Al-Qarnayni 'Imma 'An Tu`adhiba Wa 'Imma 'An Tattakhidha Fihim Husnaan
Qala 'Amma Man Zalama Fasawfa Nu`adhibuhu Thumma Yuraddu 'Ila Rabbihi Fayu`adhibuhu `Adhabaan Nukraan
Wa 'Amma Man 'Amana Wa `Amila Salihaan Falahu Jaza'an Al-Husna Wa Sanaqulu Lahu Min 'Amrina Yusraan
Thumma 'Atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Matli`a Ash-Shamsi Wajadaha Tatlu`u `Ala Qawmin Lam Naj`al Lahum Min Duniha Sitraan
Kadhalika Wa Qad 'Ahatna Bima Ladayhi Khubraan
Thumma 'Atba`a Sababaan
Hatta 'Idha Balagha Bayna As-Saddayni Wajada Min Dunihima Qawmaan La Yakaduna Yafqahuna Qawlaan
Qalu Ya Dha Al-Qarnayni 'Inna Ya'juja Wa Ma'juja Mufsiduna Fi Al-'Arđi Fahal Naj`alu Laka Kharjaan `Ala 'An Taj`ala Baynana Wa Baynahum Saddaan
Qala Ma Makkanni Fihi Rabbi Khayrun Fa'a`inuni Biquwatin 'Aj`al Baynakum Wa Baynahum Radmaan
Atuni Zubara Al-Hadidi Hatta 'Idha Sawa Bayna As-Sadafayni Qala Anfukhu Hatta 'Idha Ja`alahu Naraan Qala 'Atuni 'Ufrigh `Alayhi Qitraan
Fama Asta`u 'An Yazharuhu Wa Ma Astata`u Lahu Naqbaan
Qala Hadha Rahmatun Min Rabbi Fa'idha Ja'a Wa`du Rabbi Ja`alahu Dakka'a Wa Kana Wa`du Rabbi Haqqaan
Wa Tarakna Ba`đahum Yawma'idhin Yamuju Fi Ba`đin Wa Nufikha Fi As-Suri Fajama`nahum Jam`aan
Wa `Arađna Jahannama Yawma'idhin Lilkafirina `Arđaan
Al-Ladhina Kanat 'A`yunuhum Fi Ghita'in `An Dhikri Wa Kanu La Yastati`una Sam`aan
Afahasiba Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'An Yattakhidhu `Ibadi Min Duni 'Awliya'a 'Inna 'A`tadna Jahannama Lilkafirina Nuzulaan
Qul Hal Nunabbi'ukum Bil-'Akhsarina 'A`malaan
Al-Ladhina Đalla Sa`yuhum Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum Yahsabuna 'Annahum Yuhsinuna Sun`aan
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Rabbihim Wa Liqa'ihi Fahabitat 'A`maluhum Fala Nuqimu Lahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Waznaan
Dhalika Jaza'uuhum Jahannamu Bima Kafaru Wa Attakhadhu 'Ayati Wa Rusuli Huzuan
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Kanat Lahum Jannatu Al-Firdawsi Nuzulaan
Khalidina Fiha La Yabghuna `Anha Hiwalaan
Qul Law Kana Al-Bahru Midadaan Likalimati Rabbi Lanafida Al-Bahru Qabla 'An Tanfada Kalimatu Rabbi Wa Law Ji'na Bimithlihi Madadaan
Qul 'Innama 'Ana Basharun Mithlukum Yuha 'Ilayya 'Annama 'Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Faman Kana Yarju Liqa'a Rabbihi Falya`mal `Amalaan Salihaan Wa La Yushrik Bi`ibadati Rabbihi 'Ahadaan
